Question
========

A lottery is played with tickets numbered from 000 to 999. Everyone gets a lottery ticket and only one player can win if his or her number is chosen. John has bought one lottery ticket with the number 234 and his wife Marieke with number 456. Who has the greatest chance to win?

Answerlist
----------

* Marieke
* John
* They have equal opportunity.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Marieke: Incorrect
* John: Incorrect
* They have equal opportunity Correct
